trivia_items.text: Her codename means "black" in German, which refers to both the black tea (from which the Ceylon tea belongs to) and the black panther from which she possesses its animal traits
Schwarz is one of the few characters in Arknights who wear revealing clothes (not including outfits). This is possibly because of Siesta's subtropical climate.

During her announcement of her release, Schwarz's base artwork featured her wielding a crossbow that closely resembled a Barnett crossbow. Presumably to avoid copyright issues following her release, the artwork was changed in an unspecified update where the crossbow was replaced with a different one of original design.

Schwarz's voice actress, Shizuka Ito, is also the Japanese voice actress of Widowmaker in Overwatch. Coincidentally, both characters are a sniper and an assassin (former in Schwarz's case), and shares a similar background as well as cold and ruthless personality.
